text: This has to be the worst pizza place in Brampton don't waste your money. It has no taste they over charged me just straight up gross.

This is my first visit and we really enjoyed the pizza and wings here.  We ordered the XL Hawaiian and 20 wings and paid about $30.  Both were great but we enjoyed the wings more.  This is a good family restaurant but my only concern is kids working there - not as professional as I would like.  But the food is good.
One of the better pizzas we have tried in Brampton. Try the hot chili feast special pizza...spicy and satisfying! They are generous with their toppings too.
